Learning Resource Updates

New docs and major updates.

01-Sep-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Brightcove Interactivity API Reference
  • Description: Interactivity Read/Write API Documentation
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/interactivity/references/reference.html

Major updates

  • Title: Brightcove Live: Best Practices
  • Description: Input and Output bitrate values for Live Streaming Updated
  • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/get-started/live-module-guidelines-and-best-practices.html
  • Title: Playlist UI Plugin
  • Description: Add/remove playlist items section added
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/playlist-ui-plugin.html

25-Aug-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Requesting Late Binding
  • Description: Requesting late binding provides a way to add or modify progressive MP4 renditions for an existing video without re-creating other existing renditions. This allows you to reduce processing time while adding needed features to existing videos.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/dynamic-ingest/ingest-guides/requesting-late-binding.html

Major updates

  • Title: Continue Watching Configuration in Studio
  • Description: Continue Watching playlist in Beacon Studio

  • Title: Brightcove QoE Analytics
  • Description: Glossary updated
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/module/qoe-analytics.html#Glossary
  • Title: Brightcove Native SDK for Android: Previous SDK information
  • Description: Android SDK Release v8.2.1
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/resources/brightcove-player-sdk-android-previous-sdk-information.html
